statements: DELETE FROM inventory WHERE product_name = 'Product XYZ';
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 101 AND quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM stock_reports WHERE report_date < '2022-01-01' AND available_stock < 50;
DELETE FROM stock_reports WHERE product_id = 123 AND available_stock < 100;
DELETE FROM inventory_level WHERE current_stock < 50 AND reorder_point > 20;
DELETE FROM StockAvailability WHERE available_quantity < 10 AND location = 'Warehouse';
DELETE FROM Inventory WHERE product_id = 101 AND quantity <= 0;
DELETE FROM StockReport WHERE report_id IN (SELECT report_id FROM StockReport WHERE date_of_report < '2022-01-01') AND number_of_items < 10;
